Package it.polito.verifoo.rest.common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PhyResourceModel
    Interface to store and retrieve topological information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressMapping
    This class generates the data structure to correlate node name and node ip.
    AutoContext
    This class handles all the information about the auto-placement
    ChainExtractor
    This is the class that extract all the possible chain from a physical network
    ConditionExtractor
    This class hides all the complexities regarding the z3 deployment constraints.
    ConditionStringBuilder
    Sets up the enviroment to create a formatted string that represents a deployment
    Link
    This class is used to convert the neighbor node notion into a more convenient form in order to pass the correct information to Verifoo
    LinkCreator
    Creates the links from the node's neighbours
    LinkProvider
    Wraps the choice of the outgoing links from a certain node
    LogReader
    This class implements a way to retrive the log with a limited number of lines
    NetContextGenerator
    This class generates the nework context (the link between nodenames and node IPs in z3)
    NodeNetworkObject
    This class generates a Map of a new network object and its associated node.
    PacketWrapper
    This class converts our EndHost Packet Model configuration in the verigraph one
    Translator
    This class implements a parser for verifoo output (the z3 model), in order to translate it into the correct XML
    TranslatorBasic
    This class implements a parser for verifoo output (the z3 model), in order to translate it into the correct XML.
    VerifooNormalizer
    This class hides some limitation of z3 from the final user (e.g. two properties with same source and destination)
    VerifooProxy
    This is the main class that will interface with the Verifoo classes
    VerifooSerializer
    This class separates the Verifoo classes implementation from the actual input
    z3Translator
    This class returns the various patterns for matching the right strings in the model.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    z3Translator.Datatype  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadGraphError
    This class represents the main exception that will be thrown by the VerifooProxy Class
    ResourceModelException
    Exception thrown by the modules that implement a resource model.
